Text:
That's what i'm talking about!! Go Bears!! 

Thanks for the uploads mate.. I hope you keep uploading Bears and Pats games :)
I hope so too. You're welcome, bro!

Create the account just to thank you man, these games on of the highlights of my week, thanks for making them available

You're welcome, my friend and thank you for your appreciation!

Just wanted to extend a sincere thanks to you for making this available. I watched the game live, but was a little too drunk to remember the details lol. I just remember that the Bears offense looked potent. Can't wait to watch it again. Thanks!
